author: Cecilia Saiden Davis
transaction: Bought a townhouse in Central City East, Los Angeles, CA (2024)
text: Sebastian did an amazing job helping me purchase my home. I stayed in the exact area I wanted and he worked with me to keep the monthly payment in budget. He even introduced me to my new favorite breakfast spot. Great guy and even better agent.

author: Celina Carey
transaction: Represented us as both seller and buyer in 2024
text: Sebastian met every need at every step. When an issue came up during our purchase he quickly negotiated new terms and kept communication clear. We’ll absolutely work with him again.

author: lifechen18
transaction: Home tour in Northeast Anchorage, AK
text: Very knowledgeable and never pushy. Sebastian answered every question, kept us aware of the market, and made the entire first-time experience enjoyable.

author: mogueljulio
transaction: Bought a single-family home in Topanga, CA (2023)
text: He was invested in making sure we landed the right property and stayed responsive throughout the entire process. Couldn’t have asked for a better advocate.

author: fyt6d8k8pd
transaction: Previewed homes in Santa Monica, CA 90404
text: Sebastian showed us a ton of homes and built a step-by-step plan so we’re ready when it’s time to buy. He’ll be our go-to agent when we make the move.

author: aliensfrommarz
text: My fiancé and I found our dream home with Sebastian. He knows the market, stays on top of trends, and guides you from start to finish. Truly the best.

author: y9xxmdddpy
text: He was professional, responsive, and made our search easy. Every question had a fast answer and he knew the neighborhoods inside out.

author: Alejandra Zugasti
transaction: Bought a condo in Chino Hills, CA (2024)
text: Sebastian listened, sourced several options, and led me to the perfect home. He stayed timely, responsive, and detail-oriented through escrow.

author: zuser20161017101804419
transaction: Bought a single-family home in Hesperia, CA (2023)
text: Outstanding service from start to finish. He coordinated with every party to keep us on track and was relentlessly professional.

author: ryanbuesa
text: There’s a huge difference between a good agent and a great one. Sebastian hits every mark and now I’m seriously considering buying thanks to him.

author: akazi574
transaction: Previewed homes in Chino Hills, CA 91709
text: Sebastian was professional, educational, and patient. He walked me through the buying process and I’m excited to keep working with him.
